name: Erk: Adventures in Stone Age Real Estate
name_original: Erk: Adventures in Stone Age Real Estate
description:
Erk is a Stone Age estate agent, but unfortunately not a very good one. So much so that he's been given an ultimatum - sell a cave by sundown or lose his job. Can you help him make the sale?

Features a comedic story, classic point-and-click adventuring, cave drawing and an unlockable director's commentary!

Erk: Adventures in Stone Age Real Estate was the second point-and-click adventure game I made with Chris Jones' Adventure Game Studio, and was created in less than a month for the Stone Age-themed October 2008 Monthly Adventure Game Studio (MAGS) competition on the Adventure Game Studio forums.

Controls:
Left mouse - use (when over an object)/walk (when not over an object)
Right mouse - look (when over an object)/inventory (when not over an object)
Escape - Main menu

The game was built for Windows but is also mostly playable in ScummVM version 2.5.0 which could be used to play on Mac, Linux etc. There is a (non-game breaking) bug with the cave drawing in version 2.5.0 which may be fixed in a later version.
